title: Hisense Bottom Freezer Refrigerator 560L (64WC-RM)
description:
• Easy and simple access to cold drinks.
  • This very convenient built-in ice and water dispenser with a volume of 2.2 Liter can produce enough ice for the whole family.
  • Without opening the fridge door, you can choose out of ice cubes, crushed ice or chilled water, whatever and whenever you want. Hassle-free way of getting your cold drinks.

Designed to meet even the most demanding users. Because of its premium appearance with flat door design and recessed handles and high-quality materials this fridge-freezer is a perfect fit for any modern kitchen.

My fresh choice, the bottom right compartment, can easily be converted from a fridge and freezer with -18℃~+5℃ temperature setting. By creating the perfect temperature environment you need, you can prolong the freshness and taste quality of your desired food efficiently.

  • Triple Zone.
  • Same fridge, triple choice The three separate compartments allow you to adjust the temperature according to diﬀerent needs. The tripe temp zone avoids mixing of the smells between refrigerated and frozen food.

The rear wall of the fridge is overlaid with stainless steel, which ensures the cool air is distributed evenly from the inside out. This combination of advanced technologies ensures ideal temperature and humidity levels at all times.

title: Hisense Interactive Digital Board TV 86 Inch MR6DE 4K Smart
description:
4K Ultra HD Panel / 4K UI:

The HISENSE MR6DE Interactive Digital Board features a stunning 4K Ultra HD display, providing crystal-clear visuals with a resolution four times higher than Full HD. This ensures vibrant colors, sharp details, and an immersive viewing experience. The intuitive 4K user interface (UI) makes navigation seamless and user-friendly. Smart Power:

Equipped with Smart Power technology, the HISENSE MR6DE optimizes energy consumption without compromising performance. This intelligent feature ensures that the digital board operates efficiently, reducing electricity usage and extending the lifespan of the device. Smart Whiteboard:

Transform your meetings and presentations with the Smart Whiteboard feature. The HISENSE MR6DE allows for easy annotation, drawing, and note-taking directly on the screen. Its interactive capabilities support collaboration, making it perfect for classrooms, boardrooms, and brainstorming sessions. Wireless Transmission:

Say goodbye to tangled cables and connectivity issues with the wireless transmission feature. The HISENSE MR6DE supports seamless wireless screen sharing from multiple devices, including laptops, smartphones, and tablets. This enhances productivity and allows for effortless sharing of content. Safer and Enhanced Experience:

The HISENSE MR6DE is designed with safety and user experience in mind. It includes features such as anti-glare technology to reduce eye strain and a durable, scratch-resistant surface to ensure longevity. The device also supports secure login and data protection to keep your information safe. Dolby Atmos:

Immerse yourself in rich, lifelike sound with Dolby Atmos. The HISENSE MR6DE's audio system delivers an exceptional audio experience, providing clear and powerful sound that complements the high-quality visuals. Whether you're conducting a meeting or watching a video, Dolby Atmos enhances the overall experience. Integrated 4K Camera:

The HISENSE MR6DE comes with an integrated 4K camera, perfect for video conferencing and remote collaboration. This high-resolution camera ensures clear and detailed video quality, making virtual meetings more effective and engaging. The HISENSE MR6DE Interactive Digital Board is a state-of-the-art solution for modern businesses and educational institutions. With its advanced features and robust performance, it is designed to enhance collaboration, improve productivity, and deliver an exceptional interactive experience.

title: Hisense Soundbar with Subwoofer 160W 2.1CH (AX2107G)
description:
• The AX2107G Soundbar comes with 4 front speakers and a 160W wireless subwoofer which gives you total 280 watts superior audio, together with Dolby Atmos technology and professional master-level sound effect tuning, it will upgrade your TV sound instantly.
  • With Dolby Atmos technology, AX2107G helps to mimic the kind of immersive, and stimulates the effect that sound even come from the ceiling, to fill the room with astonishing clarity, richness, detail and depth, it feels like you are in the center of performance.
  • Most of the audio format can be decoded by AX2107G, not limited to WAV/MP3/PCM, but also include most of Dolby audio, such as Dolby Digital/Dolby Digital Plus/Dolby THD/Dolby Atmos. 4 speakers reproduce full, cinematic sound from all around you, including from above, give you high experience of enjoyment.
  • One remote control Hisense TV and soundbar, easy setup, you can control both with one remote, you will be easily enjoying TV sound in seconds.
  • Soundbar menu displayed on TV, you can control soundbar settings on TV directly, much more intuitive and convenient.
  • Supported by Hi-AT technology, when you in AI EQ Mode, AX2107G can deliver optimized sound based on each scene.
  • AX2107G has multiple connections, such as HDMI, optical/coaxial, type C and USB. No matter what you have now, you can always find the right one to connect.
  • Wireless streaming. With Bluetooth compatibility, you can wirelessly stream your favorite music and podcasts.

title: Huawei Smart PV Controller Sun2000-50KTL-M3 (50KW)
description:
With the Smart PV Controller Sun2000-50KTL-M3 from Huawei, transform your home into an oasis of green energy.

SUN2000 solar inverters are grid-tied PV string inverters that convert the DC power generated by PV strings into AC power and feed the power into the power grid.

Features:

  • Maximum efficiency 98.8% (@480V)
  • Ten independent maximum power point tracking (MPPT) circuits and 20 PV string inputs. Flexible configuration of PV strings is supported.
  • Smart PV module self-learning: Automatically detects PV module failures, helping rectify faults. Optimizes the working mode to obtain the optimal working mode of the system.
  • Smart air cooling: Adjusts the fan speed based on the ambient temperature and load to ensure the service life of fans and avoid frequent maintenance.
  • MBUS networking: Uses the existing power line for communication and does not require additional communications cable, which reduces the construction and maintenance costs and improves communication reliability and efficiency.
  • Smart I-V curve diagnosis: Implements I-V scanning and health diagnosis for PV strings. In this way, potential risks and faults can be detected in time, improving the plant operation & maintenance (O&M) quality.
  • Embedded DC and AC surge protection devices (SPDs)
  • Embedded residual current monitoring unit: Immediately disconnects from the power grid upon detecting that the residual current exceeds the threshold.
  • SUN2000 solar inverters apply to grid-tied systems of large-scale PV plants and commercial distributed grid-tied systems. Typically, a grid-tied PV system consists of the PV string, solar inverter, AC combiner box, and transformer station.

For more inquiries, please reach out to cic@fouani.com

.

title: Huawei Smart Module Controller PV Optimizer (1300 W)
description:
• Please note that this item cannot be returned or exchanged.
  • The availability is exclusively at our Lagos main warehouse. Delivery may take longer due to logistical constraints and depending on shipping location.

The smart PV optimizer is a DC to DC converter which implements maximum power point tracking (MPPT) of each PV module to improve the energy yield of the PV system. It enables module-level shutdown and monitoring, and supports long-string design.

Features:

Module-level MPPT: Implements maximum power point tracking of each PV module to improve the energy yield of the PV system. Module-level shutdown: Adjusts the module output voltage to a safe range when the output is disconnected or the inverter shuts down.

Module-level monitoring: Monitors the operating status of each PV module. Long PV string supported: If all PV modules are configured with optimizers, a PV string can contain more PV modules than conventional PV strings.

For more inquiries, please reach out to cic@fouani.com

.

title: Hisense TV UHD 70 Inch A6K 4K Smart
description:
• See every detail in stunning 4K HDR with the Hisense A6K.
  • 4K Ultra HD offers 4x more pixels than Full HD whilst HDR makes blacks darker, whites brighter and enhances contrast.
  • DTS Virtual: X™ automatically separates out dialogue from background noise for a clearer, multi-dimensional audio experience.
  • AI Picture Optimization technology instantly capture every frame of the picture and any video input signal, then automatically identifies and optimizes the image quality settings to make the viewing experience as vivid and engaging as possible.
  • For the Gamer we have Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM) which ensures smooth, lag-free and uninterrupted viewing and interaction.
  • Hisense’s new VIDAA U6 Smart TV OS lets you enjoy all your favourite entertainment from Netflix, Prime Video, and Freeview Play, and control your TV using voice with Alexa & Google Assistant built-in.

title: Hisense Bottom Freezer Refrigerator 560L (64WC-RM)
description:
• Easy and simple access to cold drinks.
  • This very convenient built-in ice and water dispenser with a volume of 2.2 Liter can produce enough ice for the whole family.
  • Without opening the fridge door, you can choose out of ice cubes, crushed ice or chilled water, whatever and whenever you want. Hassle-free way of getting your cold drinks.

Designed to meet even the most demanding users. Because of its premium appearance with flat door design and recessed handles and high-quality materials this fridge-freezer is a perfect fit for any modern kitchen.

My fresh choice, the bottom right compartment, can easily be converted from a fridge and freezer with -18℃~+5℃ temperature setting. By creating the perfect temperature environment you need, you can prolong the freshness and taste quality of your desired food efficiently.

  • Triple Zone.
  • Same fridge, triple choice The three separate compartments allow you to adjust the temperature according to diﬀerent needs. The tripe temp zone avoids mixing of the smells between refrigerated and frozen food.

The rear wall of the fridge is overlaid with stainless steel, which ensures the cool air is distributed evenly from the inside out. This combination of advanced technologies ensures ideal temperature and humidity levels at all times.

title: Hisense Interactive Digital Board TV 86 Inch MR6DE 4K Smart
description:
4K Ultra HD Panel / 4K UI:

The HISENSE MR6DE Interactive Digital Board features a stunning 4K Ultra HD display, providing crystal-clear visuals with a resolution four times higher than Full HD. This ensures vibrant colors, sharp details, and an immersive viewing experience. The intuitive 4K user interface (UI) makes navigation seamless and user-friendly. Smart Power:

Equipped with Smart Power technology, the HISENSE MR6DE optimizes energy consumption without compromising performance. This intelligent feature ensures that the digital board operates efficiently, reducing electricity usage and extending the lifespan of the device. Smart Whiteboard:

Transform your meetings and presentations with the Smart Whiteboard feature. The HISENSE MR6DE allows for easy annotation, drawing, and note-taking directly on the screen. Its interactive capabilities support collaboration, making it perfect for classrooms, boardrooms, and brainstorming sessions. Wireless Transmission:

Say goodbye to tangled cables and connectivity issues with the wireless transmission feature. The HISENSE MR6DE supports seamless wireless screen sharing from multiple devices, including laptops, smartphones, and tablets. This enhances productivity and allows for effortless sharing of content. Safer and Enhanced Experience:

The HISENSE MR6DE is designed with safety and user experience in mind. It includes features such as anti-glare technology to reduce eye strain and a durable, scratch-resistant surface to ensure longevity. The device also supports secure login and data protection to keep your information safe. Dolby Atmos:

Immerse yourself in rich, lifelike sound with Dolby Atmos. The HISENSE MR6DE's audio system delivers an exceptional audio experience, providing clear and powerful sound that complements the high-quality visuals. Whether you're conducting a meeting or watching a video, Dolby Atmos enhances the overall experience. Integrated 4K Camera:

The HISENSE MR6DE comes with an integrated 4K camera, perfect for video conferencing and remote collaboration. This high-resolution camera ensures clear and detailed video quality, making virtual meetings more effective and engaging. The HISENSE MR6DE Interactive Digital Board is a state-of-the-art solution for modern businesses and educational institutions. With its advanced features and robust performance, it is designed to enhance collaboration, improve productivity, and deliver an exceptional interactive experience.
